   You can adapt this file completely to your liking, but it should at least
   contain the root `toctree` directive.

Welcome to Log4Tailer's documentation!
======================================

Log4Tailer is a tailer with some nice features like the capability of 
tailing in a multicolored way, silence mode...

Theory and Modules involved:

.. toctree::
   :maxdepth: 1
  
   introduction.txt
   log4tailer.txt
   log.txt
   colorcodes.txt
   logcolors.txt
   logtailer.txt
